name: ROI
description: ROI Notebook ===  The name draws inspiration from ROI(return on investment)... and Notebook. The app draws inspiration from  * [Anki](https://apps.ankiweb.net/) * Supermemo * [workflowy](https://workflowy.com/) * [vimflowy](https://vimflowy.netlify.com/).
